name: kui-shell
description: This is the monorepo for Kui, the hybrid command-line/GUI electron-based Kubernetes tool

scripts.test:electron: npm run watch:electron && npm run testv2; EC=$?; npm run kill; exit $EC
scripts.test:webpack: export KUI_USE_PROXY=true; export MOCHA_RUN_TARGET=webpack; npm run watch:webpack && MOCHA_RUN_TARGET=webpack npm run testv2; EC=$?; npm run kill; npm run kill:proxy; exit $EC
scripts.testv2: export MONOREPO_MODE=true; cd packages/test && npm run testv2
scripts._kill: if [ -f /tmp/kuiwatch-$T.pid ]; then PID=$(cat /tmp/kuiwatch-$T.pid); if [ -n "$PID" ]; then kill $PID > /dev/null 2> /dev/null || true; fi; fi
scripts.kill: T=client npm run _kill; T=headless npm run _kill
scripts.kill:proxy: if [ -f /tmp/kuiproxy.pid ]; then PID=$(cat /tmp/kuiproxy.pid); if [ -n "$PID" ]; then kill $PID > /dev/null 2> /dev/null || true; fi; rm -f /tmp/kuiproxy.pid; fi
scripts._watch: bash -c "npm run kill; export CSP_ALLOWED_HOSTS='http: https: data: filesystem: about: blob: ws: wss:'; kui-watch-webpack"
scripts.watch:webpack: bash -c "npm run kill; npm run pty:nodejs && KUI_HEADLESS_WEBPACK=true npm run _watch $WATCH_ARGS"
scripts.watch:electron: bash -c "npm run pty:electron && KUI_HEADLESS_WEBPACK=true TARGET=electron-renderer npm run _watch"
scripts.watch: bash -c "npm run kill; npm run compile && npm run link && concurrently -n ES6,WEBPACK --kill-others 'npm run watch:source' 'npm run watch:electron'"
scripts.proxy: export PORT=8081; npm run kill:proxy; export KUI_USE_HTTP=true; cd packages/proxy/app && npm install && ../../../tools/travis/proxy.sh ../../..
scripts.compile:source: npm run compile:prep && npm run compile:source:es6 && npx kui-babel
scripts.compile: npm run compile:source && npm run compile:prescan
scripts.rebuild: npm run compile:clean; npm run compile
scripts.clean: npm run compile:clean; rm -rf node_modules; for i in plugins/*; do rm -rf $i/node_modules; done; for i in packages/*; do rm -rf $i/node_modules; done
scripts.link: bash -c "if [ $OSTYPE != msys ]; then CLIENT=${CLIENT-default}; CLIENT_HOME=$(cd ./node_modules/@kui-shell/client && pwd) ./packages/builder/bin/seticon.js; fi"
scripts.update: ncu -u -x "@types/yargs-parser,husky,electron,spectron,@types/webdriverio" && for i in plugins/*; do (cd $i && ncu -u -x electron,spectron,@types/webdriverio,chokidar,d3,elkjs,xtermjs,strip-ansi && rm -rf node_modules); done && rm -rf node_modules/ package-lock.json  && npm install
scripts.postinstall: npm rebuild node-sass && npm run compile && ([ "$(uname)" != "Darwin" ] || node ./node_modules/@kui-shell/builder/dist/electron/electron-download-hack.js)
